attributes.action: To stop the sacking of Great Yarmouth Dockers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Great Yarmouth Port employers have  made redundant the remaining Great Yarmouth Dockers and have stated that they will bring in casual labour to do dock work. Unite the Union opposes these dismissals and the casualisation of work.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
